I love this dress and love the look of it, but it doesn't fit! The waist comes up around my ribs. The bodice is more of an empire waist on me. Otherwise it fits perfectly, but of course, the top half is too short and I can't wear it. I will return it a little disappointed.
Fit perfectly and went great with a vintage theme

The style is adorable and the price is good, but the zipper broke the first time I put the dress on. I put on the dress, then wondered why my back felt a breeze.  My husband asked if I needed help with the zipper.  That’s when I realized it had broken.  We were heading to a pretty important work function.  Fortunately, I had a backup dress I was able to wear.

评论概述: Very cute but did not fit.
评论详情: Very cute dress and made well, however, too long.

I ordered this deep green dress for Holiday events. I thought it was fun and I received lots of compliments. I ordered a size small. For reference I am 5'1", 103 lbs, 34 A chest size. The dress has some stretch to it so it could fit up or down. The belt is usable, but it was folded which left fold marks and it too long for me, even with the adjustable/removable belt loop, so I opted to use a different belt.  I am also wearing a tutu underskirt to give the skirt some fullness. The dress was pretty wrinkled even after hanging it for awhile. I do not recommend this due to the material but I took a risk and I did iron it from the inside using a white dish cloth for an ironing cloth, on a low setting,  and the wrinkles came out pretty well. (I would recommend following the retailers recommendations.) My 4 star rating is due to the sleeves riding up on me and I would have to pull them down quite a few times, and the below average belt and wrinkles. I paired the dress with fake pearls and Mary Jane shoes to compete the look.  Love the fun 50's vibe!

This is a gorgeous dress but I wish the waist were lower. I have a very short waist so it doesn’t really work for me. But the material is high quality. I wish I could keep it .  The fit was nice just doesn’t look good.
This dress fits perfectly, is soft and comfortable, and worked great as a costume from the 50s

True to size. Clean. Stretchy material. Zipper in the back and comes with an extra button. Gloves and jewelry isn’t included. I Didn’t like that the belt was folded with creases. I wish it was packed rounded. Dress does go below the knees. I’m 5’2.  no complaints. Got it for a 1940s event

I wore this to my 1950’s house wife themed bridal shower and it was so beautiful! Wearing a medium , fit me perfectly!!! And it was comfortable, with stretchy material and kept me warm as it was chilly outside. Will definitely wear this again on a different occasion 🖤

I ordered a medium but probably should have gone with a small. It was a little bit big on me but the belt helped. I got so many complaints. I paired it with a 1950s cocktail hat and some cute vintage shoes and gloves.

评论概述: Great fit, true to size. Nice quality.
评论详情: I purchased this for a 50’s themed birthday party.

I bought the XL and XXL because I was between sizes. They both fit and I would have been happy with either, I ended up choosing the XXL to have a little more moving space in the shoulders.  The fabric on this is very high quality - thick, heavy duty with a fair amount of stretch. The color is exactly as shown, the price is very fair for the quality.

I ordered the green dress, size XXL for 5'9'' height, so that the dress goes over the knees. The product is OUTSTANDING, beautifully designed, timelessly elegant, and just needs ironing/steaming once you take it out of the package. The dress material is stretchy and heavy so that it stays put when the wind blows under your dress.

I felt so classy and the amount of compliments I received just made me feel like a million bucks! It fits well, has a great lift when you spin, and the material feels thick but not stiff.
This dress was used for a retro performance group song.  Great color and fit.

评论概述: I got SO MANY compliments in this dress!
评论详情: I purchased this dress for a 1950s themed event. I wanted to go more Audrey Hepburn and less swing dance so I thought this was a good fit. Its really nice!  The dress has a lot of stretch but not so much that it loses shape. I am pictured here wearing it over a cheap petticoat and it worked just perfectly. I wore the dress for hours and was never uncomfortable and never felt the need to fidget with it.  Notes- It definitely needed to be steamed before wearing out and about.  I am 5'10 133lbs and wearing a size small.  My only complaint was the belt. As you can see in my 2nd image the belt is clearly made to fit all the sizes. That meant that the extra flap was very very long and stuck out to comic proportions. I clipped it down for the event with a name badge so it wasn't the end of the world.
I am only 4f 7 did not have time for alterations and besides want to charge $35 to $50.00 dollars. Will not get a dress like this again

A perfect fit recommendation fabric is a little stretchy for a lovely fit and a belt with plenty of options. This dress goes great with black sheer stockings black pumps and a black handbag pairing with black gloves.

The only reason I didn’t give it five stars was because the zipper broke as soon as I put it on. Since I needed to wear the dress the next day, I had to pay $50 to have the zipper replaced which included expedited service. So basically, I paid more for the zipper than what the dress cost me which was really disappointing. That aside, the dress was well-made for the price with the exception of the zipper. I am 5’8 and 158 pounds. I usually wear a small but I sized up and got the medium, which fit perfectly especially since the fabric had great stretch. I wore this dress to a tea party and it was definitely a hit.
50s Bday party 🥳 approved.
